subject: Re: Order EE-36984 confirmed
description:
Hello,

We are enjoying our office furniture, but there is one major problem: the veneer on one edge of the desk doesn't seem to have been fully sealed down. So sometimes when a letter or notepad or anything slides across the desk, the lifted veneer catches an edge and chips off. That whole edge is now chipped and getting worse by the month. Is there anything we can do to fix this? or at least to prevent this from getting worse? The rest of the edges and the furniture itself is great quality, so it is quite unfortunate.  especially since this is the front edge of the desk so very, very, visible. I attached a picture.

Thank you in advance for any help you can provide.

-Kristen Freeman
